title: 【材质拓展】优秀材质Sphax_FTB整合包拓展材质【32x~128】
author: zq549597479
txt_content:
本帖最后由 zq549597479 于 2014-1-6 12:29 编辑 

这是Sphax材质官网上的热门MOD整合包FTB的材质拓展！{:10_526:}（睁大你的眼睛！{:10_514:}是拓展材质！{:10_521:}这意味着你需要下载Shpax对应原版材质才能达到完美应用）


因为官网没有发出图片展示效果~所以不要跟我说没有图片~问官网要去！{:10_498:}

包括的MOD有：
[attach]137869[/attach]

使用方法
正如上面所说：你需要下载一份对应原版的Sphax材质以及拓展材质一份~（PS：需要安装高清修复Optifine）
把拓展材质解压放到Sphax材质上！
放到游戏材质文件夹
修改应用材质！
Have Fun

哦！但是我没有装那么多mod喔~各种mod分开下载:（各位自行翻墙下载）
- Advanced Machines - http://bdcraft.net/forum/128x64x32x-ic2-mod-atomicstrykers-advanced... - Advanced Solar Panels - http://bdcraft.net/forum/advance ... tum-generator-up... - Buildcraft - http://bdcraft.net/forum/patch-buildcraft-3 - ChargePads - http://bdcraft.net/forum/ic2-mod-chargepads - ChickenChunks - http://bdcraft.net/forum/chicken-chunks-v101-v200 - Compact Solars - http://bdcraft.net/forum/ic2-mod-compactsolars - Computer Craft - http://bdcraft.net/forum/133-x64 ... native-textures-v02 - Equivalent Exchange 3 - http://bdcraft.net/forum/equivalent-exchange-3 - Ender Storage - http://bdcraft.net/forum/128x64x-enderstorage-v113 - Extra Bees - http://bdcraft.net/forum/128x64x-forestry-mod-extra-bees-v114 - ExtraBiomesXL- http://bdcraft.net/forum/128x64x-extrabiomesxl-v212 - Factorization - http://bdcraft.net/forum/wip142p ... w-with-100-more-... - Forestry - http://bdcraft.net/forum/x128x64-forestry-v1442-v06a - Gravity Gun - NO BDCRAFT TEXTURES - GraviSuite - http://bdcraft.net/forum/128x64x-gravitation-suite-11 - GregTech - http://bdcraft.net/forum/ic2-mod-gregtech - Industrialcraft 2 - http://bdcraft.net/forum/128x64x-industrialcraft2-v195b - Industrialcraft 2 Nuclear Control - http://bdcraft.net/forum/128x64x-ic2-mod-nuclear-control-v112-v01 - Iron Chest - http://bdcraft.net/forum/128x64x-ironchests-34-timmie-edition - Misc Peripherals - http://bdcraft.net/forum/computercraft-mod-misc-peripherals - Modular ForceField System - http://bdcraft.net/forum/thunder ... ield-system-v217020 - Modular PowerSuits - http://bdcraft.net/forum/wip128x-machinemuses-modular-powersuits - Mystcraft - http://bdcraft.net/forum/128x-mystcraft - NEI - http://bdcraft.net/forum/128x64x ... -v1223#comment-form - OmniTools - http://bdcraft.net/forum/128x64x32x-bc3ic2rcte-mod-omniwrench - PetroGen - NO BDCRAFT TEXTURES - Portal Gun - http://bdcraft.net/forum/portal-gun - Railcraft - http://bdcraft.net/forum/railcraft-520 - Redpower - http://bdcraft.net/forum/128x64x-redpower-pr5b2 - Rei's Minimap - http://bdcraft.net/forum/reis-minimap - SoulShards - http://bdcraft.net/forum/128x64x-soul-shards-111 - Steve's Cart's 2 - http://bdcraft.net/forum/steves-carts-2-0 - Thaumic Bees - http://bdcraft.net/forum/forestry-mod-thaumicbees - Thaumcraft 3- Very Higly WIP, if you want to add it to the pack visit here. - Thermal Expansion - http://bdcraft.net/forum/thermal-expansion - Traincraft - http://www.reddit.com/r/mindcrack/comments/168s99/ - Twilight Forest - http://bdcraft.net/forum/wip-twilight-forest - Wireless Redstone CBE - http://bdcraft.net/forum/128x64x ... enbones-edition-... - Xeno's Reliquary - NO BDCRAFT TEXTURES - Xycraft - http://bdcraft.net/forum/xycraft-machines-other-beta[/spoiler]

你们光下载不顶不说~而且还不给我加人气加金币！{:10_522:}
你们良心过得去吗！{:10_524:}

还有就是整合材质下载：（对应FTB这个整合包
）
求人气~求金币
